purpose: Enable users to update an employee's advance details, including the addition of a new advance amount and providing a description of the change.

static: Labels: Employee Type, Employee, Previous Advance, Total Advance, Description
Pre-filled Employee Name and ID (e.g., 'Raghu E - 9845784512')
Pre-filled Previous Advance and Total Advance amounts
dynamic: TextField for Total Advance (pre-filled based on calculation)

layout_recommendations: Use Scaffold with a SingleChildScrollView to ensure the screen handles overflow properly
Column for vertical alignment of fields
Padding with EdgeInsets.symmetric(16) around main content for spacing
Row widget for labels and input fields to maintain alignment
Text styling with Theme.of(context).textTheme for consistency
Action buttons ('Cancel' and 'Update Employee') should be placed at the bottom in a Row widget
user_interactions: Select an Employee from the dropdown list
Enter the Advance Amount in the text field
Total Advance field auto-updates based on the calculation of Previous Advance + Advance Amount
Tap 'Cancel' button clears the form and navigates back
Tap 'Update Employee' button triggers form validation and updates employee advance
